mil7.8.1:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kumbhassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.8.1:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgame adhigame pariyattiyaṃ sāmaññe pāramiṃ patvā na saṇitabbaṃ, na tena māno karaṇīyo, na dabbo dassetabbo, nihatamānena nihatadabbena bhavitabbaṃ, ujukena amukharena avikatthinā.
mil7.8.1:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kumbhassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
